trans-unit.source: Represents a Workflow role that is backed by a <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un ruolo di flusso di lavoro supportato da un <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] For more information about roles in ASP.NET, see [Role Providers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Per ulteriori informazioni sui ruoli in ASP.NET, vedere [i provider di ruoli](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> class by using the specified role name.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome del ruolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che definisce il nome del ruolo.

trans-unit.source: roleName contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: roleNamecontiene un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> class by using the specified role name and role provider.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref> classe utilizzando il provider di ruoli e il nome del ruolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di ruoli più comunemente usati per <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>le classi che ereditano da <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> sono</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Tali classi includono <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che definisce il nome del ruolo.

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the role provider.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che definisce il provider di ruoli.

trans-unit.source: roleName contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: roleNamecontiene un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of ASP.NET accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elenco generico di account ASP.NET è associato il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> supports only <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>supporta solo <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, it supports these methods only for the user account that is currently the WindowsPrincipal associated with the request context, so you cannot call <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> for any user account in the domain.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, supporta questi metodi solo per l'account utente che è attualmente l'oggetto WindowsPrincipal associato al contesto della richiesta, pertanto non è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>per qualsiasi account utente nel dominio.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the GetIdentities method with the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, the following provider exception is thrown: The configured Role Provider (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) relies upon Windows authentication to determine the groups that the user is allowed to be a member of.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza il metodo GetIdentities con il <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, viene generata l'eccezione di provider seguenti: il Provider di ruoli configurato (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) si basa sull'autenticazione di Windows per determinare i gruppi che l'utente può essere un membro del.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Role Manager cannot be used to manage Windows users and groups.
trans-unit.target: Gestione ruoli ASP.NET non può essere utilizzato per gestire utenti e gruppi Windows.

trans-unit.source: Use the SQLRoleProvider if you want to support custom user/role assignment.
trans-unit.target: Si desidera supportare l'assegnazione di utenti e ruoli personalizzati utilizzare SQLRoleProvider.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of string values that represent the ASP.NET accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco generico di stringhe che rappresentano gli account ASP.NET associati il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> contains the specified identity
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref> contiene l'identità specificata

trans-unit.source: The name of the identity to test for.
trans-unit.target: Nome dell'identità per il test.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> contains the specified identity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref> contiene l'identità specificata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa che contiene il nome del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Name was set to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Nome è stato impostato su un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the role provider for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il provider di ruoli per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di ruoli più comunemente usati per <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>le classi che ereditano da <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> sono</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Tali classi includono <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the role provider for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il provider di ruoli per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.
